page.description: Writes a string or blob to a file.
page.syntax: Bytes_Appended as N = Append(C Filename, C string | B blob)

argument.name: Bytes_Appended
argument.description: The size increase of the file.

argument.name: Filename
argument.description: The file that receives the character or blob data.

argument.name: string
argument.description: The text to add to FileName.

argument.name: blob
argument.description: The blob data to add to FileName.

page.discussion: The FILE.APPEND() method appends a blob or text to the end of a file. It does not add a line feed. The method creates the file if it does not already exist.
